meanings.definition: Cook (food) again, typically after it has already been fried once.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, I decided to refry the leftover chicken for a snack.
meanings.sent2: My mom always refries the potatoes to make them extra crispy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left the fries in the pan for too long, so I had to refry them to avoid burning them.
meanings.sent4: The chef had to refry the fish to perfection before serving it to the customers.
meanings.sent5: The smell of refrying onions filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
